after many years and a host of card games in the vein of slay the spire monster train remains the gold standard an absolutely smashing game with a clever defensive twist on the roguelike card game fomula attractive visuals and a easy to learn but surprisingly deep binary reward mechanism easily one of the best games in my library and still fun after all these years as an aside the last divinity dlc is one of the best out there and worth every penny

fun little deckbuilding game if you like games like slay the spire or even want to get into the genre this game is a good one to try  like slay the spire theres a surprising amount of variety when it comes to the decks you can build the story itself is pretty short but theres still tons of replayability  although i dont like it quite as much as slay the spire i still enjoyed this game thoroughly and would recommend it
